mapper.sql: select T.ROW_ID as id, date_format(T.CREATED,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as created, T.CREATED_BY as createdBy, date_format(T.LAST_UPD, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as lastUpdated, T.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy, t1.NAME cityName, t.COMMENTS comments, t.IMAGE_ID imageId, t.CITY_ID cityId, t.HEAD_ID headId, t1.T_ATTR_05 organizationId, t2.row_id orgId
FROM CX_O_BTN_IMG_CT t LEFT JOIN (CX_O_AREA t1 LEFT JOIN lnk_org_ext T2 ON T2.ROW_ID = T1.T_ATTR_05) on t1.row_id=t.CITY_ID
mapper.insert: insert into CX_O_BTN_IMG_CT (ROW_ID, COMMENTS , CITY_ID , HEAD_ID) values (#{id},#{comments},#{cityId},#{headId})
